thread.title: Ken Podlin to Lead Sales and Marketing Efforts at Property Debt Research

author: cnbc.com
title: Ken Podlin to Lead Sales and Marketing Efforts at Property Debt Research
text:
FORT MYERS, Fla., March 27, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Ken Podlin has been named National Director of Sales and Marketing at Property Debt Research (PDR).
Following multi-year stints at Cardel Homes, Bonded Builders Warranty Group, American Land Lease, and Grimaldi Commercial Realty Corp., respectively, Podlin will be guiding PDR into a new era of marketing and sales strategies.
A highly-accomplished executive who "excels at analyzing multi-region customer needs, identifying lucrative growth opportunities, and defining strategies for capturing new business," Podlin is assuming a role that is ideally suited for PDR's market leading position.
Podlin has long been recognized as a thought leader in the broader real estate industry as well as a "big-picture" decision-maker with a keen awareness of market share potential.
In addition to being a main visionary for the sales and marketing efforts at PDR, Podlin will be ensuring the company's clients are receiving what they were promised â€” on point and on time.
Bruce Russell, PDR's CEO, says, "Ken is a great addition to our dynamic management team. His experience with national expansion will be highly valuable to PDR as we further enhance our national expansion.
As a Municipal Lien Search and HOA Estoppel letter provider, Property Debt Research has been a trusted source across Florida for over two decades.
With an average turnaround time of six days or less, the company prides itself on delivering results that are accurate, fast, and dependable for clients across Florida.
